attributes.action: For the United Kingdom to Cut the overseas aid budget by 75%
attributes.additional_details: Welfare/Police/Fire services/Public Services are being cut. The money saved can help these services.
attributes.background: The UK spends Billions of pounds of hard earned UK Taxpayers Money. The UK is having to cut Welfare and other services in the UK. I propose a cut in the UK Overseas "Foreign" Aid Budget by 75% and the money saved can be reinvested into UK Public Services.
